# nxos_tacacs (Resource)

This resource can manage the Tacacs configuration.

- API Documentation: [aaaTacacsPlusEp](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-2-2/docs/Security%20and%20Policing/aaa:TacacsPlusEp/)

### Parent resources

- [nxos_aaa](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/nxos/latest/docs/resources/aaa)

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "nxos_tacacs" "example" {
  deadtime         = 100
  password_type    = "0"
  password         = "secret_password"
  timeout          = 10
  source_interface = "lo0"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `deadtime` (Number) Duration for which non-reachable server is skipped.
  - Default value: `0`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `password` (String) TACACS+ server shared secret.
- `password_type` (String) Password Encryption Type.
  - Choices: `0`, `6`, `7`
- `source_interface` (String) Source Interface. Must match first field in the output of `show intf brief
  - Default value: `unspecified`
- `timeout` (Number) Timeout value for TACACS+ server.
  - Default value: `5`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import nxos_tacacs.example "sys/userext/tacacsext"
```
